title: Login page not responding
description: Users are reporting that the login page becomes unresponsive after entering credentials. The submit button doesn't work and no error message is displayed.

title: Database connection timeout
description: Application is experiencing intermittent database connection timeouts during peak hours. This affects multiple users and causes data loss.

title: Add export to Excel feature
description: Request to add an export functionality that allows users to download reports in Excel format. Should include all columns from the current grid view.

title: Email notifications not working
description: Email notifications for ticket updates are not being sent. SMTP configuration has been verified and appears correct.

title: Performance issues on dashboard
description: Dashboard takes over 10 seconds to load when displaying more than 100 tickets. Need to optimize queries and implement pagination.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: Mobile application crashes immediately after launch on Android devices running version 12 and above. iOS version works fine.

title: Update user profile UI
description: Current user profile page needs a UI refresh to match the new design system. Include profile picture upload and bio section.

title: Security vulnerability in API
description: Potential SQL injection vulnerability detected in the search API endpoint. Needs immediate attention and patching.

title: File upload fails for large files
description: Users cannot upload files larger than 5MB. The upload process starts but fails midway without any error message. Need to increase file size limit.

title: Implement two-factor authentication
description: Add two-factor authentication feature for enhanced security. Should support both SMS and authenticator app methods.

title: Search function returns incorrect results
description: The search functionality is returning irrelevant results. Seems like the search algorithm is not matching keywords properly.

title: Add dark mode theme
description: Users are requesting a dark mode theme option. This should be toggleable and persist across sessions.

title: Password reset link expired
description: Password reset links are expiring too quickly (within 15 minutes). Users are complaining they don't have enough time to reset their passwords.

title: Broken links in documentation
description: Several links in the user documentation are broken or pointing to outdated pages. Need to audit and fix all documentation links.

title: API rate limiting not working
description: API rate limiting seems to be bypassed by some clients. Need to investigate and fix the rate limiting middleware.

title: Add bulk delete feature
description: Request to add functionality for bulk deletion of tickets. Should include a confirmation dialog to prevent accidental deletions.

title: Payment gateway integration issue
description: Payment transactions are failing intermittently. Error logs show connection timeout to payment gateway. Need to implement retry logic.

title: Improve error messages
description: Current error messages are too technical for end users. Need to implement user-friendly error messages with helpful suggestions.

title: Session timeout too short
description: Users are complaining that they get logged out too frequently. Current session timeout is 15 minutes, should be increased to at least 30 minutes.

title: Add attachment preview feature
description: Users should be able to preview attachments (images, PDFs) without downloading them. Implement inline preview functionality.
